mapper.insert: insert into basket(basket_no, product_info_no, user_id, product_cnt) values(#{basketNo}, #{productInfoNo}, #{userId}, #{productCnt})
mapper.select: select basket_no, b.user_id, product_img, product_name, product_cnt, w.product_no, product_price from basket b left join wishlist w on (b.user_id = w.user_id) left join product p on (p.product_no = w.product_no)
